ModMetaData.name: [Fuu] Punch Attack
ModMetaData.author: Fuu Chan
ModMetaData.description:
An unarmed prisoner is escaping! Quick, slice their limbs off with a plasmasword!
I'm sure we all wish we could simply order colonists to punch without unequipping them (or can't even unequip if they have implanted weapons). So here's a punch button!
This simply uses the same code used for social fighting, so it should be compatible with anything.
Primary Changes Adds a punch attack button that appears while colonists are drafted, which functions the same as melee attack, but uses only unarmed attacks (won't use implant weapons either!)
*Near 0% performance impact (0.001ms per selected pawn when button needs to be rendered). *Safe to add mid-game. *Safe to remove mid-game, but make sure no colonists are in the middle of a punch attack job. *Confirmed compatible with CE, Vanilla Expanded series, Alpha series, and Humanoid Alien Races. *No other known incompatibilies.
(Steam workshop can be slow/janky at detecting updated mods. If the mod doesn't update, unsubscribe, wait a few seconds, and resubscribe to force it to download the latest files) ~2.0 update: Now compatible with 1.4!
Github Link: https://github.com/tenguin/Rimworld_PunchAttack
Credits to: sakino_shingetu, Inugami Korone, and Princess Connect: ReDive for the art sources used in the thumbnail and tanosii_chan for the upvote animation! Give them a visit!
